Name: Zerone 2D
About the game: Spin to win! Change the direction of gravity by rotating the screen itself! Zerone is a simple platformer with an abstract art style and a plethora of relaxing levels and optional challenges. Being simple to learn, this game is for everyone. Challenge yourself to speed through each level as fast as possible, collect every cosmetic item, or pace yourself and relax to the atmospheric music. The choice is yours! Rhythm-Driven Gameplay Move to the music to overcome even the most difficult challenges, whether it's beating the level before time runs out, avoid falling from the platform, or worse shattering into a million pieces by the infamous checkered tiles; Only time will tell how relaxing this game can be if you choose to beat all the challenges this game has to offer. Star Collection Collect the stars each level to unlock bonus in-game content. Watch out for the elusive gold stars to unlock the best bonus content!!! Ball Customization Be rewarded with awesome bonus contents like awesome new colors, trail effects, and patterns to give your ball more personality. Relaxing Music and SFX The relaxing music is tailored to the rhythm and style of each level, with sound effects adjusting to the level's music. Level System Unlock new levels and new areas by beating all levels which you have not earned stars in yet!!!
